query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflow_enrollments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  workflowId INT NOT NULL,
  subscriberId INT NOT NULL,
  currentStepId INT NULL,
  status ENUM('active', 'completed', 'paused', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  enrolledAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  nextScheduledAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (workflowId) REFERENCES email_workflows(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriberId) REFERENCES newsletter_subscribers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (currentStepId) REFERENCES workflow_steps(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_workflow_subscriber (workflowId, subscriberId),
  INDEX idx_next_scheduled (nextScheduledAt),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Hyo2L8cuQnYKpK.root --database grCyd6mifTZvX8AxBen7Th --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflow_enrollments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  workflowId INT NOT NULL,
  subscriberId INT NOT NULL,
  currentStepId INT NULL,
  status ENUM('active', 'completed', 'paused', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  enrolledAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  nextScheduledAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (workflowId) REFERENCES email_workflows(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriberId) REFERENCES newsletter_subscribers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (currentStepId) REFERENCES workflow_steps(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_workflow_subscriber (workflowId, subscriberId),
  INDEX idx_next_scheduled (nextScheduledAt),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);
